entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, referred to by name. ("You, Harry")

entities.name: dedalus
entities.description: A person who is speaking to Harry and explaining the arrangements. ("Dedalus continued")

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: A person who was supposed to take Harry by Side-Along-Apparition but cannot do it now. ("Mad-Eye will explain")

entities.name: hestia
entities.description: A person who is speaking and telling Harry that Mad-Eye cannot come. ("Hestia tersely")

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The family of Harry's relatives, referred to as a group. ("The Dursleys")

relationships.description: Harry is being spoken to by Dedalus. ("Dedalus continued, ‘will wait here for your guard.’")
Harry is being spoken to by Hestia. ("Hestia tersely.")
Mad-Eye was supposed to take Harry by Side-Along-Apparition. ("I thought Mad-Eye was going to come and take me by Side-Along-Apparition?")
Harry is related to the Dursleys. ("The Dursleys, who had listened to all of this with looks of utter incomprehension on their faces")
